output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in burnFrom function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
transferFrom function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control. It allows arbitrary transfers between users, allowing attackers to steal assets.
sell function allows attackers to manipulate the sell price, aka the 'tradeTrap' issue.
buy function allows attackers to manipulate the buy price, aka the 'tradeTrap' issue.
